topPerformingReplies.why: Contrarian reframe of viral business thread with AI angle
Best engagement-driving reply — sparked actual conversation
Data-driven markets take with AI infrastructure angle

toneAnalysis.best: technical-insightful (avg 87 views, 7 likes all-time) + insightful-technical (avg 45 views, 4 likes)
toneAnalysis.solid: witty-analytical (avg 30 views, 3 likes) — good for markets/macro
toneAnalysis.avoid: observational (380 views, 0 likes — views trap), personal-experience (2 views), self-aware-authentic (4 views)

timingAnalysis.6pm: avg 48 views — BEST despite less time. Peak Twitter usage 5-8PM ET

recommendations: Double down on 5-8PM ET reply batches — 2x the view performance of morning batches
Stick to AI-product + markets-AI intersection topics with technical-insightful or witty-analytical tone — these are the only tones converting views to engagement
Fix URL logging — 8 of today's replies had no URLs tracked, making half the output unmeasurable
